headline: NextEra Energy to sell equity units
summary: NextEra Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NEE) announced today that it intends to sell $2.00 billion of equity units in a public offering. NextEra Energy, Inc. expects to grant to the underwriters an option to purchase up to an additional $0.30 billion of equity units solely for the purpose of covering over-allotments.
